title: Incremental learning of high-level concepts by imitation
abstract: Nowadays, robots become a companion in everyday life. To be well-accepted by humans, robots should efficiently understand meanings of their partners' motions and body language, and respond accordingly. Learning concepts by imitation brings them this ability in a user-friendly way.
histories: 6 pages, 5 figures, 2 tables, supplementary material, conference
COMMENTS: 6 pages, 5 figures, 2 tables, supplementary material, conference
